reviewText: alright so perhaps she didn't actually commit the murders, but I believe she ( at the very least ) knew who did! Therefor I will never believe that she was innocent. The fact is we will never know what happened that night,  but by watching factual documentaries such as this one, it is interesting  to imagine different scenerios. After staying in the Borden house for a  night ( creepy huh ) I feel even more strongly that Lizzie had some part (  if only a small one ) of this gruesome affair.
